DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate if a treatment with metformin compared to placebo reduces metabolic side-effects in patients with glucocorticoid treatment over three months time.
DOC.brief_title: Metformin to Prevent Metabolic Complications in Glucocorticoid Excess
DOC.criteria: Glucocorticoid treatment for ≥ 3 months with a prednisone dose of ≥ 7.5mg/d or equivalent glucocorticoid Refusal of informed consent Prior therapy with metformin during the last 6 month Preexisting diabetes Pregnancy or current malignancy Renal insufficiency with a creatinine clearance lower than 30ml/min
